1 #ifndef _LS_ARMA_CPP
2 #define _LS_ARMA_CPP
3 #include "ls_arma.h"
7 template<class Tx, class Tad>
8 LinearSolverArma<Tx, Tad>::LinearSolverArma(std::shared_ptr<Mesh<Tx, Tad>> val_mesh, std::shared_ptr<Config<Tx>> val_config){
9  const auto nic = val_mesh->nic;
10  const auto njc = val_mesh->njc;
11  const auto nq = val_mesh->solution->nq;
12  const auto ntrans = val_mesh->solution->ntrans;
13  n = nic*njc*(nq+ntrans);
14  rhs = arma::Mat<Tx>(n, 1);
15  dq = arma::Mat<Tx>(n, 1);
16  lhs = arma::SpMat<Tx>(n, n);
17 };
18 
19 template<class Tx, class Tad>
20 void LinearSolverArma<Tx, Tad>::set_lhs(int nnz, unsigned int *rind, unsigned int *cind, Tx *values){
21  number_lhs_update += 1;
22  Tx value_tmp;
23  for(size_t i=0; i<nnz; i++){
24  value_tmp = values[i];
25  lhs(rind[i],cind[i]) = value_tmp;
26  }
27 };
28 template<class Tx, class Tad>
29 void LinearSolverArma<Tx, Tad>::set_rhs(Tx *val_rhs){
30  number_rhs_update += 1;
31  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++){
32  rhs(i, 0) = val_rhs[i];
33  }
34 };
35 
36 template<class Tx, class Tad>
37 void LinearSolverArma<Tx, Tad>::solve(){
38  if(number_rhs_update != number_lhs_update){
39  spdlog::get("console")->warn("Number of rhs update does not match with the number of lhs update!");
40  }
41  dq = arma::spsolve(lhs, rhs, "superlu");
42  };
43 
44 template<class Tx, class Tad>
45 void LinearSolverArma<Tx, Tad>::solve_and_update(Tx *q, Tx under_relaxation){
46  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++){
47  q[i] = q[i] + dq(i,0)*under_relaxation;
48  }
49 };

54 };
